argument.name: settings
argument.description: Settings for the audio player. This will override the initial values of the properties of the A5.audio.Player class.

property.name: heartbeat
property.description: Rate of heartbeat in seconds, "0" equals no heartbeat, the default in "0.25".

property.name: onBeforePlay
property.description: Event for when playback is initiated, before playing has started. If still buffering "onPlay" will happen after "onLoaded". This event fires for both inital play, and resuming from paused.

property.name: onPlay
property.description: Event fired when playback starts. This event fires for both inital play, and resuming from paused.

property.name: onPause
property.description: Event fired when playback is paused.

property.name: onChange
property.description: Event fired when audio player state changes.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data for that change event

argument.name: type
argument.description: The type of change. "timeupdate" while playing, "buffer" while the audio file is being buffered.

property.name: onBeforeLoad
property.description: Event fired before audio is loaded.

argument.name: src
argument.description: An array of the sources of the audio file to load.

property.name: onLoaded
property.description: Event fired when audio is loaded.

property.name: onDone
property.description: Event fired when playback is done, either by reaching the end, or by being stopped by the A5.audio.Player.stop() method.

property.name: state
property.description: The state of the audio player. State is updated by audio events, if you want to refresh "stale" state information use the A5.audio.Player.getState() method.

property.name: stream
property.description: Whether the audio is a stream.

property.name: buffer
property.description: Amount buffered, a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

property.name: current
property.description: Current play time of the audio in seconds.

property.name: duration
property.description: Total duration of the audio in seconds.

property.name: volume
property.description: Current volume, a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
